Yes, the Seeker is interested in the recommendation. The recommendation has not yet been accepted, but the Seeker is engaging in the conversation.\n-Explicit Acceptance: If the Seeker clearly expresses their intention to watch the recommended movie, such as saying "I will try it," or "I will watch it," return 5. The recommendation has not yet been accepted, but the Seeker is engaging in the conversation.\n-Explicit Acceptance: If the Seeker clearly expresses their intention to watch the recommended movie, such as saying "I will try it," or "I will watch it," return 5.
